programme.title: The Homecoming - EP 11
programme.desc: Dong Weihong returns to Singapore from the United States with his 9-year-old son after many years. He catches up with his old-time buddies, Chen Hanyuan, Lai Guoqiang and Huang Zhenfa to reminisce the past. Although they shared a secret past, they have now taken different paths in their life. Weihong helps in Zhenfa's car dealing business, while Hanyuan is a successful lawyer. Guoqiang earns his livelihood as a hired "scapegoat" for criminals.

programme.title: L'amour D'une Femme
programme.desc: Marie Prieur, a young doctor, takes up a post on Ouessant Island. Quickly adopted by the inhabitants, she becomes friends with the school teacher. When she falls in love with a young engineer, Andre Lorenzi, he quickly makes it clear that she must choose between marriage and her profession.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Planete Rap - EP 9
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.desc: In a tribal court in Brazzaville, the judges go to great lengths to reconcile families torn apart by accusations of black magic. At the heart of this unique form of justice: a world governed by spirits, where witch doctors take revenge, sirens disappear and the unseen are always at work...

programme.title: Martinique, Sainte-Lucie, Dominique
programme.desc: Three different faces of the Lesser Antilles: Martinique and its many attractions; Saint Lucia, its little English-speaking sister to the south; Dominica, celebrated by the Kalinagos... Beyond the picture postcard scenery and legendary good life, these Caribbean islands are home to a natural world that is both generous and unspoilt.

programme.desc: The French lyrical singer, Edwin Fardini has sung a thousand and one stories yet never recounted his own. How to allow our different fundamental influences to coexist?

programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. programme.title: Tempete
programme.desc: Zoe grows up on a stud farm and her only dream is to become a jockey. Her mare Tempete is her best friend. But they have an accident one stormy evening. Zoe is left paraplegic. She clings on for years and tries to achieve the impossible of fulfilling her destiny.

programme.title: Au-Dela Des Murs
programme.desc: One morning, Lina is getting ready to go to Baumettes prison to attend her first visit. Nadjim, her boyfriend, has recently been imprisoned. Before leaving, she gathers things to take to him.

programme.desc: Suspicion falls on the brother of one of Henri's former patients, who had threatened him. Marine and William are finding it increasingly hard to cope with their mother's disappearance. Simone and Danno step up their efforts in an investigation they'd expected to be simple, but so far they're getting nowhere.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 4
programme.desc: Despite his grief Henri manages to keep going. Firstly with his son William, who's starting to worry him, and with his patients who need him. But Henri is still wary about revealing the identity of his patients, notably those he has doubts about, claiming a duty of professional secrecy.

programme.desc: Despite its proximity to the sea, swimming is a declining practice in Polynesia. Between pools and lagoons, a look at its rediscovery among young people, female triathletes, and champion Nicolas Vermore.

programme.title: Einstein - EP 6
programme.desc: Discovery of the Swiss scientific world! Due to their accessible approach, even the most complicated scientific topics and techniques become easy to understand and appealing.

programme.title: Jean-Louis Foulquier, Plus Belle La Nuit
programme.desc: Recounting the life and career of Jean-Louis Foulquier (1943-2013), inevitably starts by meeting those who crossed his path, fellow adventurers on the airwaves, but also includes the creation of the Francofolies de La Rochelle in 1985. And the artists, already well-known faces, who became regular partners for his nocturnal escapades...

programme.title: Tour De Cote D'ivoire 2025
programme.desc: Summary of the day's Tour de la Cote d'Ivoire with highlights, classifications and the chance to find out more about a location from the day's stage.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Donner L'gout
programme.desc: Discover the various world cultures that shape Quebec's identity through cuisine and its chefs, accompanied by Helene Bourgeois.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Einstein - EP 6
programme.desc: Discovery of the Swiss scientific world! Due to their accessible approach, even the most complicated scientific topics and techniques become easy to understand and appealing.

programme.title: En Vadrouille - EP 10
programme.desc: In Vichy, Loic Ballet meets Pierre Billon. Musician, composer, producer, and friend for over fifty years of Johnny Hallyday, he tells the wandering host about his journey with the youth idol.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 3
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 51
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 37
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 38
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 17
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 18
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: Pompon Ours, Les Speciaux - EP 2
programme.desc: It's nearly time for the winter festival. Pompon learns to skate on the frozen lake and prepares his present for Rita: a superb pair of skates. But the next day the lake ice has melted! Catastrophe, Pompon's surprise is worthless... There's only one solution, to summon the spirit of winter.

programme.title: Donner L'gout

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 9
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Mourir D'aimer
programme.desc: In May 1968, 32 year-old Daniele is passionate and politically-committed young woman. But when she begins a relationship with Gerard, her 17 year-old student, the affair rapidly becomes a scandal. The teenager's parents bring charges against her for corrupting a minor. Daniele is sent to prison...

programme.title: Voir Le Soleil Se Lever Dans La Lune
programme.desc: At the end of his life, Victor Hugo goes to see the ocean one last time and confronts his ghosts. A poetic and dreamlike film, inspired by ''Les Contemplations''.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 3
programme.desc: Dani Räber isn't giving into Strunz's blackmail: the documents have no importance. Will the criminal fall into the trap? Suspected of murder, Zingg is set free but Kägi is watching him. Rosa Wilder hopes that her sick father will agree to undergo a treatment which could save his life.

programme.title: Movie - Ponniyin Selvan 1
programme.desc: Sensing an uprising in the capital, Crown Prince Aditha Karikalan sends his friend Vallavaraiyan Vandiyadevan on a mission that sets off a series of conspiracies against the reigning king.

programme.title: Movie - Sri
programme.desc: Srikantu and his uncle travel to India from Bangkok to seek Srikantu's ancestral property. However, when he meets Jennifer in a bank, a group of robbers are planning to kidnap the trio.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Mutham Oru Yudham
programme.desc: Oru Mutham Oru Yutham is a Tamil romantic movie directed by Suba Selvam. The film stars Uday Kiran and Swetha Basu Prasad.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Nadigayin Vaakkumoolam
programme.desc: A reporter sets off to find an actress who disappeared into obscurity at the peak of her career. She finally finds the actress at a brothel and learns some shocking truths.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sollamale
programme.desc: Shwetha, a rich and kind woman, assumes that Nadaraj cannot speak and shows empathy towards him. When their friendship blossoms into love, Nadaraj faces an arduous task of proving his love.

programme.title: Movie - Dhinandhorum
programme.desc: Dhinamdhorum is a 1998 Tamil-language film directed by Nagaraj. The film features Murali and Suvalakshmi in the lead roles, while Manivannan and Renuka play supporting roles, with music by Oviyan.

programme.title: Movie - Vazhve Mayam
programme.desc: Raja and Devi fall in love with each other and get engaged. However, when Raja learns that he is suffering from cancer, he hides it from Devi and calls off the engagement.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Oorille Oru Rajakumari
programme.desc: After being mistreated by his family for being unemployed, a youth decides to get married only to a princess but eventually falls for a poor girl. The girl is actually a princess and is in search of a man who will love her for her and not her riches.

programme.title: Movie - Villan
programme.desc: Shiva, a bus conductor, robs from the corrupt in order to fund an organisation that aids the disabled. He also pretends to be his own disabled twin in order to avoid detection and trial.

programme.title: Movie - Thangam
programme.desc: Thangam, a landlord, dearly loves his sister. When Arusamy rapes his sister, Thangam is forced to let him marry her. When his sister is killed despite all his sacrifices, he vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Puthiya Kathai
programme.desc: Oru Pudhiya Kadhai is a 1990 Indian Tamil-language romantic drama film directed by R. Balasubbiah, starring Prabhuraj and Meena.

programme.title: Movie - Othikai
programme.desc: At various Indian tourist spots, especially hill stations, numerous lovers end their lives for love, but some lovers are being killed. The movie deals with this subject with a mix of thriller, action and romance.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Subash
programme.desc: In order to marry the girl he loves, Subash, a good-for-nothing youth, joins the army. When he returns, he learns that his own brother is using corrupt ways to gain power in politics.

programme.title: Movie - Neethiyin Marupakkam
programme.desc: Vijayakumar falls in love with the zamindar's daughter and the two decide to marry. However, things turn sour when the zamindar kills his brother and mother, compelling him to seek revenge.

programme.title: Movie - Solla Marandha Kadhai
programme.desc: Sivadhanu, an educated but unemployed honest man, gets married to the daughter of a rich man and moves to their house. However, taunts and disrespect compel him to find a new job in another town.

programme.title: Movie - Thulli Thirintha Kaalam
programme.desc: Khushboo faces several difficulties when she tries to discipline a group of youngsters who are idlers and always cause huge embarrassment to their families.

programme.title: Movie - Kidari
programme.desc: Kombaiah Pandiayan, a big shot in his village, is stabbed by one of his enemies. Following this, his loyal servant Kidaari sets out to find the culprit.

programme.title: TotalEnergies BWF World C'ships 2025 Final (Live)
programme.desc: The BWF World Championships is the most prestigious badminton competition, offering the most ranking points. The winners of the tournament are World Champions of the sport and are awarded a gold medal. The tournament started in 1977. Starting 2006, the tournament was changed to an annual event on the BWF calendar. The tournament is not held during the Summer Olympics years to avoid schedule conflicts.

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025
programme.desc: HSBC BWF World Tour is the eighth season of the BWF World Tour of badminton, a circuit of 31 tournaments that lead up to the World Tour Finals tournament. The tour features five levels, with different levels of prize money in each of the tournaments.

programme.title: ASO Marathon Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Barcelona Marathon is an annual marathon held in March in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, and first held in 1978 in Palafrugell, Catalonia. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe's Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week's Big Interview, the Toon's number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke's journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.desc: One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League champion and Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 1
programme.desc: Dietmar Hamann was an influential presence in the Liverpool side of the early 00's. The German international recalls some memorable matches and rivalries for the Reds.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 25/26 MW03 Liverpool v Arsenal
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2025/26 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Arsenal (MW03) (Live) - EP 30
programme.desc: Liverpool are winless in six Premier League matches against Arsenal (D4 L2), their longest winless run against the Gunners since going eight without a win between October 2007 and April 2011.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe’s Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week’s Big Interview, the Toon’s number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Brentford (MW03) - EP 24
programme.desc: Sunderland vs Brentford will be the 940th different fixture to have been played in the Premier League. They last faced in the top-flight in the 1946-47 campaign, with the Black Cats winning 3-0 away and 2-1 at home.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Everton (MW03) - EP 26
programme.desc: Wolves have lost just two of their 11 Premier League home games against Everton (W4 D5), going down 3-0 in April 2011 and 2-1 in January 2021.

programme.title: PL Moments 2025/26 - EP 1
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar reflects on his remarkable career in English football, selecting his ten greatest Premier League moments from his time with Fulham and Manchester United, sharing the stories behind iconic saves, record breaking runs, and title winning triumphs that cemented his status as one of the league’s all-time great goalkeepers.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs West Ham United (MW03) - EP 29
programme.desc: West Ham United haven’t scored in any of their last four Premier League visits to the City Ground (D1 L3) - the last Hammers player to score there was Michael Hughes in September 1996.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Arsenal (MW03) - EP 30
programme.desc: Liverpool are winless in six Premier League matches against Arsenal (D4 L2), their longest winless run against the Gunners since going eight without a win between October 2007 and April 2011.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Manchester City (MW03) - EP 28
programme.desc: Between 2017-18 and 2023-24, Brighton and Hove Albion only avoided defeat in two of 14 Premier League games against Man City (W1 D1 L12); last season, they didn’t lose against City, winning 2-1 at home and drawing 2-2 at the Etihad.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Crystal Palace (MW03) - EP 21
programme.desc: Crystal Palace won 4-1 in their last meeting with Aston Villa in February, last winning consecutive league games against them in the 2013-14 campaign.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth (MW03) - EP 25
programme.desc: Tottenham manager Thomas Frank has managed more Premier League games against Bournemouth without losing than against any other side (P6 W4 D2), while the only manager he’s beaten more often than Andoni Iraola (3) is David Moyes (5).

programme.title: Leeds United vs Newcastle United (MW03) - EP 27
programme.desc: Leeds have lost just one of their last six Premier League games against Newcastle (W2 D3), going down 1-0 at home in January 2022.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe’s Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke’s journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1 from Dolphins Arena in Nagoya, Japan features Takarafuji, Ichinojo, Shimanoumi and Kiribayama.

programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Dallas with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying round's 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Swinging Frames!

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Abu Dhabi Grand Slam on world Judo day, we speak to double world champion Mayra Aguiar about the unity of the Brazilian judo team, and watch as two world champions battle for gold in the -57kg division.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Dmitry Priog vs. Daniel Jacobs
programme.desc: This episode features a middleweight battle between Dmitry Priog and Daniel Jacobs that ends in a crushing overhand right, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Jose Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his NABF welterweight title against Jose Miguel Cotto, Alvarez's final bout before rising through the ranks and championships of the WBC. Also on the card, a heavyweight kickboxing clash between Errol Zimmerman vs. Rico Verhoeven.

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Caleb Plant
programme.desc: The Undisputed Super Middleweight World Championship is on the line as Canelo Alvarez defends his WBA, WBC, and WBO Super Middleweight World Championship titles against Caleb Plant, while attempting to claim the IBF World Title to become Undisputed Champion. Canelo has not lost a fight since a decision loss to Floyd Mayweather over seven years prior, including a recent stoppage victory over Billy Joe Saunders to win the WBO Title.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Lennox Lewis vs. Mike Dixon
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. Twenty fights into his professional career, highly touted Olympic Gold Medalist Lennox Lewis was taking the steps towards claiming his first World Championship. He had knocked out nearly all of his opponents to this point, and a showdown with nemesis "Razor" Ruddock was just a few months away.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Jhonny Gonzalez vs Gerry Penalosa
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Jhonny Gonzalez defending the WBO bantamweight title against Gerry Penalosa. A left hook to the body ends the fight. Also on the card, a controversial ending to the Nate Campbell / Ali Funeka brawl.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Little Woo and Seamus call Stanley to help them build a den so they can watch the bugs in the forest without disturbing them. Stanley builds a giant, camouflaged den on legs.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Fifi asks Stanley to help her find a new place for her friend Isabelle the Sun-bell Daisy. This proves trickier than initially planned as Isabelle has some specific needs.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Myrtle, Sophie and Benjamin call Stanley to teach them how to make a sandcastle. Myrtle asks for a bigger one, so big it turns into a sandcastle resort!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Fred, Fifi and Ari call Stanley to help them with their recycling drive by coming up with a way of repurposing all the towns' old stuff. Stanley makes a crazy golf course!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Benjamin and Sophie have a new bug friend. Stanley helps build a bug feeder which attracts lots more bugs. They eat so much; Stanley gets more food and builds a Bug Hotel for them.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Myrtle calls Stanley to see if she can practice her first aid skills on him, but he's all fit and healthy. Instead, they go about the town making good use of Myrtle's newfound abilities.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 49
programme.desc: Myrtle calls Stanley to help solve the mystery of the Phantom Knitter. Overhearing this, Fifi jumps at the chance to help forming a dynamic, detective duo!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: Stanley's friends throw him a birthday party. No work for Stan today. Cynthia and Jose take a call from Amare, her tractor is stuck in the mud. Soon, so are all Stanley's vehicles.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: Benjamin can't find his favourite toy, Wonder Vole anywhere. Stanley suggests they retrace his steps but have no luck. Maybe Wonder Vole Pyjamas will help Benjamin feel brave.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Fifi, Little Woo and Fred call up Stanley to ask him to film their new song. They go around the town trying to find the perfect place.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Stanley is very busy, so he invents three little robots called the Can Bots to help. They begin well but soon start getting out of hand. Stanley has some reprogramming to do.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Stanley asks Sophie to help out with a few of his jobs whilst she waits for her dino costume to dry. The pair go about town fixing everyone's problems in fun and imaginative ways.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Fifi asks Stanley to help them find a Mermaid so they can take its picture for school. They explore the ocean floor in their search where they encounter lots of ocean creatures.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: There are leaves all over the place, Stanley tries to gather them up in his van with his leaf blower, but it is harder than he thought and fills Myrtle's house with them instead.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Cynthia is working on the bus so asks Stanley to take her passengers to the community centre. He uses Amare's tractor and trailer, his car, a boat, and a bath to make a Bus-Train.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Town Hall clock is broken, it's lost its Ding Dong. It will take hours to fix, so Stanley asks noisy Fred if he will shout "DING DONG" when the big hand is pointing up.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and Cousin Lexi visit the farm. They find out how the animals keep warm in winter and Gran Gran has a plan to help Lucy the lama keep cosy!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Jared has a special plant which needs a pot, so JoJo makes him one in a pottery class. When the pot is knocked onto the floor and breaks, Gran Gran has a plan.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sarah's hoping for a nice quiet birthday, but there's no chance once her friends arrive.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 8
programme.desc: When James hears the children of Sodor talking about their latest comic book superhero, he imagines that he too can become a hero.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.desc: The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 47

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 48

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1) - EP 12

programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 47

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 48

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2025
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Millennial Money

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: tiny desk concerts Japan

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 288
programme.desc: Embark on a two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all corners of Korea! The 2 Days and 1 Night cast travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of neighbours and beautiful nature.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 586
programme.desc: Witness the parenting challenges of "Superman", the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 494
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to a new country, South Korea, for reasons such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society are unfolded!

programme.title: Our Golden Days - EP 4
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days, whether now, in the past, or in the future. This heartfelt family melodrama resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Heart on Wheels - EP 7
programme.desc: This observational variety show features a mobile convenience store packed with daily necessities that is delivered to a rural village, spending the night there.

programme.title: Got The Spot in Gangnam - EP 2
programme.desc: Famous influencers visit Korea's most iconic spots to experience and explore them.

programme.title: My Only One - EP 105
programme.desc: A woman's life changes one day when her biological father shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been hiding his identity, afraid of being an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives, putting back the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: My Only One - EP 106

programme.title: ASEAN⋅Korea Music Festival 2025 ROUND in Malaysia
programme.desc: A public cultural diplomacy project designed to broaden the Korea-ASEAN cooperation relationship and provide a venue for cultural exchange among Asian youth through popular music. Indonesia, Busan, and Laos will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia this year. KBS presents various live musicians of K-music to ASEAN beyond the limits of K-pop, and plays a central role in connecting 10 ASEAN countries and Korea with culture.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 10
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 14
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 15
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 17
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 12
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 13
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 12
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 10
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 51
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2027
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 699
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 24
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 35
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2027
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an - EP 9
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an - EP 10
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 15
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: Eternity - EP 6
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: To Grow With Love - EP 19
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 20
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 21
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Wax and Wane - EP 15
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 6
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 15
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 16
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 1
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 15
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 16
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 18
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong's enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense...

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, he'd still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tai's best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s "a-go-go" era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him...

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: As Shen and Wong Fei Hung's relationship turns sour, Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhou's favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlord's daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Strangers When We Meet
programme.desc: The film is based on the true story of The Murder Girl Wearing a Wedding Dress. Two prisoners, one seeking his son and the other seeking money, enter into a marriage of convenience driven by their respective motives.

programme.title: Right up Your Alley - EP 1
programme.desc: Right up Your Alley takes you on a delicious journey through bustling streets and hidden alleys. Taste authentic local delights, hear heartfelt stories, and discover the soul of the city in its most genuine form.

programme.title: The Runner - EP 22
programme.desc: Editor Ho Ka-Yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned to dig up news about the Windchasers Club. The story tells people of different backgrounds overcome their past move forward bravely through athletics.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025 Mark Selby vs Ben Woolaston
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.
